description.@en: A glancing touch is all you need to rust and destroy objects.

data.distance: Any one object you can touch

criticalFailure.@en: As you stomp on the nail, it drives deep into your foot! Although you do not suffer Damage, all terrain is treated as Hard Terrain for 24 hours.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but you can permanently rust an object no larger than a carriage is tall.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the object you touch (providing itâ€™s no larger than a human is tall) is permanently rusted, considered to be useless until repaired.

reagents.@en: A rusted nail, crushed beneath your heel (expended)
